Class SpatialOperationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util.SpatialConfig

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SpatialOperationConfig
extends SpatialConfig
implements java.io.Serializable

    Defines how a spatial operation should be performed
